1362790.name: Fantasy Grounds - 13 Class Options Bundle
1362790.description:
13 Class Options Bundle

Always Keep Your Spells Ready and a Trick Up Your Sleeve
Play the character you have always wanted in the 13th Age. These new class options for the Cleric, Fighter, Rogue, and Wizard classes are just what you need to bring down the toughest monsters and make your game worthy of the best stories for years to come. Strike fear into the hearts of your enemies and win the day like never before.
13 Class Options Bundle is a supplement for the 13th Age Roleplaying Game. Inside you will find:
  • 13 New Cleric Domains and Spells--ideal for characters divinely inspired, everything from turning the tide of a desperate battle to wielding the very weapon of your deity
  • 13 New Fighter Talents and Maneuvers--letting martial characters claim the highest initiative to raining down arrows upon your enemies
  • 13 New Rogue Talents and Powers--giving you the power to dabble in the arcane arts to bringing the pain late in a fight
  • 13 New Wizard Cantrips and Spells--wield eldritch power to create in illusionary double of yourself or hurl your enemies skyward
Wield Legendary Power in the 13th Age
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Dale Mc Coy
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the 13th Age ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
